primary_diagnosis.justification: The patient has a confirmed history of recurrent episodes (as established by the Clinical Entity Agent's review, denying manic/hypomanic history). The current episode is coded as moderate severity (F33.1) based on the ongoing, impactful symptoms requiring medication initiation (*Sertraline* started 4 weeks ago), aligning with the provided peer feedback.
dsm_criteria_met: A. Meets criteria for a Major Depressive Episode (Inferred by treatment necessity)
B. Symptoms cause clinically significant distress or impairment (Inferred by medication start)
C. Not due to substance or general medical condition
D. The episode is not better explained by Schizoaffective Disorder and is not superimposed on Schizophrenia
E. There has never been a manic or hypomanic episode (Confirmed by Clinical Entity Agent)

ruled_out.reason: Explicitly ruled out by the Clinical Entity Agent based on patient report denying any history of manic or hypomanic episodes.

ruled_out.description: Major depressive disorder, single episode, moderate
ruled_out.reason: Ruled out as the patient's history confirms previous episodes, warranting the recurrent specifier (F33.x).
